thread.title: LeBron James, J.R. Smith and Timofey Mozgov out versus Sixers
thread.title_full: LeBron James, J.R. Smith and Timofey Mozgov out versus Sixers | cleveland.com

author: Chris Haynes, Northeast Ohio Media Group
title: LeBron James, J.R. Smith and Timofey Mozgov out versus Sixers
text:
PHILADELPHIA â€“ The Cleveland Cavaliers will not have LeBron James, J.R. Smith and Timofey Mozgov in uniform for tonight's game against the Philadelphia 76ers.
Head coach David Blatt said the starters would include Mo Williams, Matthew Dellavedova, Richard Jefferson, James Jones and likely Anderson Varejao.
Blatt said there's a small possibility Varejao takes the game off, too. They want to monitor his condition after his pregame workout.
These moves were expected. Blatt plans to preserve some of his veterans throughout the exhibition schedule. Six of the team's seven games are part of back-to-back sets.
After tonight's contest, Cleveland's next game will be on Monday against the Memphis Grizzlies in Columbus. Kevin Love could suit up for that game.
UPDATE: Sasha Kaun started in his place at center and Varejao comes off the bench.
